Working with Text

The body is the element that wraps what shows on the HTML page. As I write this I am using p tag enclosed in arrows to show paragraphs.

We seperate paragraphs using p tag enclosed in arrows.


The space between this paragraphs and the one above is created using a line break tag. The tag is br contained in arrows.

The header is an H# tag. The H stands for the header and the number following the H is the size of the Header with 1 being the largest and 6 being the smallest. The H and the sizing are contained within arrows.

The Strong element makes the text BOLD.

The EMPHASIS tag makes the text EMPHASIZE the word.

These tags can be nested within an element and we show this using indentation.

We can comment non showing lines in HTML with !---- enclosed in arrows. The comment cannot be seen on this page but in the code it will show.
